short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pastes links on Roam Research as Markdown and set the link text as the linked page title

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When pasting a link on Roam Research, this extension will look for the browser tab that correspond to the pasted link, extract the tab title and use it to create a markdown link.
